parameters.jsonBody:
={
"name": "{{ $json['Profile Name'] }}",
"startDate": "{{ new Date(($json['Start Date'] - 25569) * 86400 * 1000).toISOString().split('T')[0] }}",
"endDate": "{{ new Date(($json['End Date'] - 25569) * 86400 * 1000).toISOString().split('T')[0] }}",
"searchViews": {{ $json['Search Views'] }},
"interactions": {{ $json['Interactions '] }},
"websiteClicks": {{ $json['Website Clicks'] }},
"directionRequest": {{ $json['Direction Request'] }},
"phoneCalls": {{ $json['Phone Calls'] }},
"reviews": {{ $json.Reviews }},
"reviewResponses": {{ $json['Review Responses'] }},
"ratings": {{ $json['Ratings '] }},
"websiteSpeed": "{{ $json['Website Speed'] }}",
"seoScore": {{ $json['SEO Score'] }},
"keyword1": "{{ $json['Keyword 1'] ? $json['Keyword 1'] : null }}",
"rank1": {{ $json['Rank 1'] ? Number($json['Rank 1']) : 0 }},
"keyword2": "{{ $json['Keyword 2'] ? $json['Keyword 2'] : null }}",
"rank2": {{ $json['Rank 2'] ? Number($json['Rank 2']) : 0 }},
"keyword3": "{{ $json['Keyword 3'] ? $json['Keyword 3'] : null }}",
"rank3": {{ $json['Rank 3'] ? Number($json['Rank 3']) : 0 }},
"keyword4": "{{ $json['Keyword 4'] ? $json['Keyword 4'] : null }}",
"rank4": {{ $json['Rank 4'] ? Number($json['Rank 4']) : 0 }},
"keyword5": "{{ $json['Keyword 5'] ? $json['Keyword 5'] : null }}",
"rank5": {{ $json['Rank 5'] ? Number($json['Rank 5']) : 0 }},
"citations": {{ $json['Citations '] }},
"backlinks": {{ $json['Backlinks '] }},
"contentMarketing": {{ $json['Content Marketing'] }},
"creatives": {{ $json.Creatives }},
"shortsReels": {{ $json['Shorts/Reels'] }},
"websiteSeo": true,
"localSeo": true,
"webSocialAudit": true
}
